FuncDef: This command determines the Diameter session ID when Extended Failure Handling (EFH) is active and an attempt is made to establish a new Diameter Gy session with the Online Charging Server (OCS). An attempt to establish a new Diameter Gy session is made when the allocated interim credit is used or the validity time expires for a rating group of a Diameter Gy session. The first attempt always uses a new Diameter session ID. This command controls the behavior for each subsequent attempt. The behavior is as follows:
